what: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: zuericssstyle R-Package, provides specific css files styled shiny widgets according corporate design city Zurich. package contains widgets styling Statistik Stadt Zürich used far creating shiny apps conform corporate design.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: easiest way get zuericssstyle install repo: Alternatively, download files (clicking ‘Clone download’ / ‘Download Zip’), extract location computer, e.g. Desktop run:

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: check version zuericssstyle, run:

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: number functions wrap around original shiny functions provide styling. functions allow additional parameters original shiny function used passed along.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: widgets need css work. added html dependency using ssz_page add_zcss_deps functions. Use ssz_page styled drop-replacement shiny’s fluidPage: Alternatively, using fluid page, wrap ui (e.g. fixedPage whatever fancy) add_zcss_deps:

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: based shiny’s numericInput.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shiny’s selectInput.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shiny’s radioButtons. Use inline = TRUE horizontal alignment.
code: sszRadioButtons(    inputId = "ButtonGroupLabel",    label = "Flughafen:",    choices = c("EWR", "JFK", "LGA"),    selected = "JFK"    )

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shinyWidgets::radioGroupButtons.
code: sszRadioGroupButtons(     inputId = "years",     choices = 2022:2024,     selected = 2022 # default value   )

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shiny’s textInput.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: relies autocomplete_input() function dqshiny package.
code: sszAutocompleteInput(             "street",             "Geben Sie eine Strasse ein",             unique(addresses$StrasseLang)           )

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shiny’s sliderInput. Currently officially part city’s CI/CD. Therefore styling sliderInput might vary slightly later point time (2024-10-16).

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: function wraps around shiny’s actionButton.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: download button downloading excel/csv file can called image parameter optional; based shiny’s downloadButton. button link external site, e.g. Open Government Data portal,  can used Provide appropriate link href parameter.
code: sszDownloadButton("csvDownload",                         label = "csv",                         image = img(icons_ssz("download"))                         ) sszOgdDownload(outputId = "ogdDown",                          label = "OGD",                          href = "https://data.stadt-zuerich.ch/",                          image = img(icons_ssz("external-link"))             )

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: default, language German date format dd.mm.yyyy. additional parameters shiny’s dateRangeInput can passed parameters.

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: contrast standard dateRangeInput, airDatepickerInput allows selection years, years months, rather ‘’ year-month-day dateRangeInput default, language set 'de', dateFormat "dd.mm.yyyy". parameters can overridden supplying something else. options adding specific calendar icon. can passed used instead default Shiny calendar icon form htmltools::tags$img(...). version sszAirDatepickerInput() calendar icon styled according corporate design city Zurich.
code: sszAirDatepickerInput(           inputId = "airMonthStart2",           label = "Basis Datum",           dateFormat = "MM-yyyy",           view = "years",           minView = "months",           autoClose = TRUE,           ssz_icon = img(icons_ssz("calendar"))         )

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: need css file e.g. style html report, use get css file written local folder. Alternatively, can provide full filepath (something like “C:/temp/mystyling.css” parameter.)

title: Statistik Stadt Zürich CSS styling for shiny apps and html
text: encounter bug, please open issue contact statistik@zuerich.ch.

title: zuericssstyle 1.0.0
text: functional changes improve pkgdown site add GitHub GitLab badges everything ready publication swissstatsr

title: zuericssstyle 0.2.3
text: functional changes create pkgdown site update packages various minor changes re. documentation package development

title: zuericssstyle 0.2.2
text: functional changes! update packages add GitLab Pipeline automatic code publication GitLab

title: zuericssstyle 0.2.1
text: new function sszRadioGroupButtons, generating styled shinyWidgets::radioGroupButtons

title: zuericssstyle 0.2.0
text: major refactoring css separate scss files, can compiled larger css files use new css files styling remove get_shiny_css function, shiny, ssz_page add_zcss_deps used

title: zuericssstyle 0.1.0
text: add ssz_page add_zcss_deps functions; first directly create fluid page ssz styling, latter add styling kind html/ui create examples widgets inst/examples remove sszActionButtonIcon, use action button icon anyway work properly
